amendment.description: Amendment removes language that would limit the amount that families receiving certain Federal housing assistance can deduct from their income for childcare expenses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 114-411 to remove harmful language that would limit the amount that families receiving certain federal housing assistance can deduct from their income for childcare expenses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters, Maxine amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Waters, Maxine.
